data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 58,465 believers in Chocó that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chocó, Colombia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: There are 544,800 people living in the state of Chocó. Only about 58,465 might be believers.
Lord, teach the young people in the state of Chocó to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Chocó, Colombia to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Embera-Baudo people. Make the Embera-Baudo people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Chocó that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Chocó, Colombia a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Chocó, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

location.name: Chocó
location.people_groups_list: Embera-Catio, Katio, Embera-Chami, Embera, Northern, Embera-Tado
